name: David's Clone Catastrophe
description:
In spring of 2052, the first and only clone machine was invented. Nothing could’ve prepared the world for what would follow. 

Controls:

WASD to move

Shift to sprint

Mouse to look around and aim

Left click to shoot/attack

Right click to throw grenades

R to reload

E to interact (pick up ammo, sneak attack, get in car)

Q to throw gun
